extension.name: plg_content_thickbox
extension.author: Horst Lindlbauer
extension.description:
Thickbox+ for Joomla 3.x

ThickBox+ is a one-for-all content box to show a single image, image galleries, inline content, iframed content, or content served through Ajax in a hybrid modal window.

For details on usage and demos refer to demo page.

field.name: thumb_width
field.label: Thumbnail Width
field.description: Set the width of the thumbnail to be created (default: 100px)

field.name: thumb_height
field.label: Thumbnail Height
field.description: Set the height of the thumbnail to be created (default: 75px)

field.name: thumb_quality
field.label: Thumbnail Quality
field.description: Set the quality of the thumbnail to be created (default: 80, max: 100)

field.name: thumb_border
field.label: Thumbnail Border width
field.description: Set the border width of the thumbnail to be displayed (default: 0 = no border)

field.name: thumb_bordercolor
field.label: Thumbnail Border color (HEX) #
field.description: Set the border color (HEX) of the thumbnail to be displayed (default: 000 = black)
